item.title: 12 Bar Blues
item.description: You might have heard of the blues, made famous as a way to make a living in the US for marginalized citizens. The story goes that the French taught the Black community music theory and unlocked a creative juice thirsting for expression. 12 bar blues is very basic music lesson and is known universally by musicians as a way to quickly join other musicians musically. Scales: a quick primer ðŸŽ¼ The most common western scale - the major scale - has 7 notes representing pitch.
